description:
Like a puffer for your feet and ankles. The Thermoball waterproof lace up boots use light, warm insulation to trap heat. They're lined in fleece and have a water-shedding outer shell. Let it snow!

  • Water-resistant recycled shell has a PFC-free DWR finish that sheds water
  • Waterproof DryVent™ membrane, because you can’t doge every puddles
  • ThermoBall™ Eco insulation uses post-consumer recycled material and retains warmth when wet
  • OSO fleece lining wicks moisture and keeps warm air in
  • Cinch strap at ankle
  • Supportive OrthoLite® Eco LT™ footbed uses 5% recycled rubber and 8% plant-derived bio-oil instead of petroleum
  • Chunky rubber outsole offers great traction
name: The North Face ThermoBall Lace Up Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
